member.name: T:Tekla.Structures.Internal.UnhandledExceptionHandler
member.summary: The class catches uncaught exceptions from the current appdomain and shows a dialog with the exception's message in it before the application terminates.

member.name: M:Tekla.Structures.Internal.UnhandledExceptionHandler.RegisterHandler(System.String)
member.summary: Register the uncaught exception handler for the current appdomain. The exported function name is so short because there is a limitation to the max length of an Akit Method's name.
